titleStmt.title: At the general sessions of the peace, and goal delivery held for the city of London, on Wednesday the 31st of August, at Justice-Hall in the Old Bayly, in the three and thirtieth year of our Sovereign Lord, Charles, &c.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Nathaniel Thompson found guilty of libel for printing The loyal Protestant.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
